metal_rampart.name: Metal Rampart
metal_rampart.desc: Form a medium size pillar at the user location .

metal_ball.name: Metal Ball
metal_ball.desc: Form yourself into a metal ball and rush forward.

metal_wisp.name: Metal Wisp
metal_wisp.desc:
A servant of metal.
[Regenerates armor durability, and applies Metal Rods when the caster vents.]

metal_fakeout.name: Metal Fakeout
metal_fakeout.desc: Create a metal clone and appear behind your taget.

metal_gatling.name: Metal Gatling
metal_gatling.desc: A deadly rush of several metallic rods.

metal_rain.name: Metal Rain
metal_rain.desc: Rain down a incredible amount of metal rods

iron_hug.name: Iron Hug
iron_hug.desc: Grab your opponent and crush them with your ironclad grip.

metal_eruption.name: Metal Eruption
metal_eruption.desc: The user stomps on the ground, and spawns a fury of metal spikes

iron_slam.name: Iron Slam
iron_slam.desc:
Conjure a giant rod of metal and slam it down.
[*Guardbreaks at Level 5]

rocket_lance.name: Rocket Lance
rocket_lance.desc: Create a lance, impale your opponent, and send them flying.

metal_armament.name: Metal Armament
metal_armament.desc: Coat both your body and sword in an ironlike and fluctuating iron-bits. While active, it will swing a Kyrscleave-like Greatsword upon m1 (with an interval of 3s).

iron_quills.name: Iron Quills
iron_quills.desc: Conjure metal from within, impaling surrounding enemies.

metal_kick.name: Metal Kick
metal_kick.desc: A powerful kick laced with metal.

firing_line.name: Firing Line
firing_line.desc: The user spawn 5 gun behind them which will start firing at the target immediately.

oxidizing_rush.name: Oxidizing Rush
oxidizing_rush.desc: Conjure metal swords and rush forward with them

chain_pull.name: Chain Pull
chain_pull.desc: Conjure a chain to pull your opponent.

metal_turret.name: Metal Turret
metal_turret.desc: An automated turret that fires at targets that cross its sight.

iron_skin.name: Iron Skin
iron_skin.desc: Upon use you coat your skin with a dark-ironlike substance, negating 75% of damage taken during the mantra's use.

tempest_blitz.name: Tempest Blitz
tempest_blitz.desc: Sprint forward on the winds themselves and deliver a devastating thunder kick.

flashfire_sweep.name: Flashfire Sweep
flashfire_sweep.desc: Sweep with flames and lightning before following into a devastating uppercut.

permafrost_prison.name: Permafrost Prison
permafrost_prison.desc: Imprison your enemies with shadows and impale them with pillars of ice.

iron_tether.name: Iron Tether
iron_tether.desc: Summon two cubes tethered by lightning, setting a trap for your enemies.

shade_step.name: Shade Step
shade_step.desc: Submerge into your shadow. Click to launch an attack at any point while sumberged.

encircle.name: Encircle
encircle.desc: Conjure shadows around your enemy before warp-striking to them.

shade_wisp.name: Shade Wisp
shade_wisp.desc:
A servant of shadows.
[Grants passive Tempo and occassionally conceals the caster (just their body, not location).]

shadow_seekers.name: Shadow Seekers
shadow_seekers.desc: Call forth the void to track your opponents.

shadow_vortex.name: Shadow Vortex
shadow_vortex.desc:
Create a shadow vortex that pulls in everything in its surroundings.
[VAULTED]

shadow_gun.name: Shadow Gun
shadow_gun.desc:
An awful blast of dark energy.
[*Guard breaks at Level 5 **without** Blast Spark]

shade_bringer.name: Shade Bringer
shade_bringer.desc: Temporarily summon a shadow greatsword for a large slash.

shade_devour.name: Shade Devour
shade_devour.desc: Gorge on your own health for raw strength.

devouring_eye.name: Devouring Eye
devouring_eye.desc: Summon a fragile eye that consumes the ether of those who try to cast mantras within it's gaze.

ice_skate.name: Ice Skate
ice_skate.desc: Skate freely on paths of ice.

frost_wisp.name: Frost Wisp
frost_wisp.desc:
A servant of Ice.
[Occasionally freezes the ground below you. Shoots a small beam of ice whenever the user vents successfully.]

ice_forge.name: Ice Forge
ice_forge.desc: Conjure and throw weapons of ice.

ice_lance.name: Ice Lance
ice_lance.desc: Form an icy spear and lunge forward.

ice_fissure.name: Ice Fissure
ice_fissure.desc: Send ice rippling out in a shockwave.

crystal_impale.name: Crystal Impale
crystal_impale.desc: Impale your foes with a brutal crystal smash.

crystal_knee.name: Crystal Knee
crystal_knee.desc: Knock your enemy skyward with a kick of crystal.

ice_smash.name: Ice Smash
ice_smash.desc:
A colossal mace of ice.
[*Guard breaks at Level 5]

rising_frost.name: Rising Frost
rising_frost.desc: Conjure a glaive of frost to launch your opponents skywards.

ice_flock.name: Ice Flock
ice_flock.desc: Send forth a flock of ice.

ice_daggers.name: Ice Daggers
ice_daggers.desc: Form and toss daggers of ice at your aimed opponent.

ice_cubes.name: Ice Cubes
ice_cubes.desc: Manifest cubes of Ice to fire at your enemies. Cast mantra again to fire cubes.

gale_wisp.name: Gale Wisp
gale_wisp.desc:
A servant of wind.
Reduces fall damage by 20%.
With Specter Path, restores your  Spectral Gauge.
With Haunted Gale, increases the duration of your Phantoms by 3s.

wind_carve.name: Wind Carve
wind_carve.desc: A quick swirl of sharp winds.

wind_forge.name: Wind Forge
wind_forge.desc: Encircle your foes with blades of wind that halt their escape until they respond.

twister_kicks.name: Twister Kicks
twister_kicks.desc: Go forth with spinning kicks infused with the wind.

gale_punch.name: Gale Punch
gale_punch.desc: Form a punch of wind in your fist and release it.

champions_whirlthrow.name: Champion's Whirlthrow
champions_whirlthrow.desc:
Grab your opponent and toss them with the power of gale.
[*Guard breaks at Level 5]

pillars_of_erisia.name: Pillars of Erisia
pillars_of_erisia.desc: Gaining inspiration from the Duke of Erisia, call forth a malicious gale from your stomp.

astral_wind.name: Astral Wind
astral_wind.desc: A rapid delivery of consecutive attacks.

rising_wind.name: Rising Wind
rising_wind.desc: Use wind to uppercut and propel yourself into the air. Press F after hitting an opponent to impale them.

flame_assault.name: Flame Assault
flame_assault.desc: Dash forward in a spiral of flames.

flame_leap.name: Flame Leap
flame_leap.desc: Leap up leaving behind a burst of flames. Those nearby are dragged up too.

flame_wisp.name: Flame Wisp
flame_wisp.desc:
Create a servant of flames.
[Converts 20% of your burn damage to healing (your flames deal reduced damage).]

ash_slam.name: Ash Slam
ash_slam.desc: Strike the ground, turning it to ash.

flaming_scourge.name: Flaming Scourge
flaming_scourge.desc: Conjure a flaming whip and sling your foes around and into the ground with a devastating slam.

flame_repulsion.name: Flame Repulsion
flame_repulsion.desc: Charge up an exertion of flames that knocks opponents backwards. If you take damage while charging, you repulse it back.

burning_servants.name: Burning Servants
burning_servants.desc: Summon a legion of flaming spearmen that lunge inwards.

relentless_flames.name: Relentless Flames
relentless_flames.desc: Bear down on your foes with repeated fiery slashes.

flame_grab.name: Flame Grab
flame_grab.desc: Jet forwards with flames and slam anyone you catch in your clutches.

fire_gun.name: Fire Gun
fire_gun.desc: Shoot successive bullets of fire from your fingertips.

flare_volley.name: Flare Volley
flare_volley.desc: Conjure up to 3 fireballs to volley at your enemies.

searing_snare.name: Searing Snare
searing_snare.desc: Place a fiery snare at a chosen location. Enemies that stumble into it are scorched.

fire_blade.name: Fire Blade
fire_blade.desc:
Release a slash of flames downwards that deals heavy posture damage.
[*Guard breaks at Level 5]

flame_ballista.name: Flame Ballista
flame_ballista.desc: Conjure a flaming arrow and fire it at your target.

fire_forge.name: Fire Forge
fire_forge.desc: Conjure flaming daggers and throw them forwards.

graceful_flame.name: Graceful Flame
graceful_flame.desc: Conjure a campfire for you and your comrades to rest by.

flame_of_denial.name: Flame Of Denial
flame_of_denial.desc: While active, you get right back up after being knocked.

flame_blind.name: Flame Blind
flame_blind.desc: Shoot a projectile that explodes after a short delay and blinds those looking at it.

sanguine_dive.name: Sanguine Dive
sanguine_dive.desc: Create or jump into a pool of blood.

blood_wisp.name: Blood Wisp
blood_wisp.desc:
A servant of blood.
[Occasionally regenerates a small portion of your blood.]

bloodtide_ritual.name: Bloodtide Ritual
bloodtide_ritual.desc: Summon the Bloodtide and perform a sacrificial judgement.

bloodcurdle.name: Bloodcurdle
bloodcurdle.desc: Manipulate the blood within your target's body.

crimson_rain.name: Crimson Rain
crimson_rain.desc: Release blood daggers. Recast to recall them.

vicious_descent.name: Vicious Descent
vicious_descent.desc: Leap into the air and slam down with vengeance.

crimson_surge.name: Crimson Surge
crimson_surge.desc: Slash upwards and launch slashes of blood.

bloodedge.name: Bloodedge
bloodedge.desc: Conjure a scythe of blood and swing.

soulflare_siphon.name: Soulflare Siphon
soulflare_siphon.desc: Grab and siphon the blood out of your victim.

razor_blitz.name: Razor Blitz
razor_blitz.desc: Create weapons on your arms and dash through.

blood_orb.name: Blood Orb
blood_orb.desc: Release an amalgamation of your blood.

veinbreaker.name: Veinbreaker
veinbreaker.desc: Charge up a strong punch infused with your blood.

ether_barrage.name: Ether Barrage
ether_barrage.desc: Conjure concentrated orbs of Ether to launch at your enemy.

lightning_cloak.name: Lightning Cloak
lightning_cloak.desc:
A lightning cloak that empowers you.
[Note: Increases swing speed by 10% and empowers your dashes.]
[Note: The duration of this Mantra can be increased by chaining attacks.]

thunder_wisp.name: Thunder Wisp
thunder_wisp.desc:
A servant of lightning.
[Applies "Sapping" to a target upon being uppercutted or flourished.]

rising_thunder.name: Rising Thunder
rising_thunder.desc: Rise up with your opponent and crash down as a bolt of lightning.

thunder_kick.name: Thunder Kick
thunder_kick.desc:
An unrelenting kick like a clap of thunder.
[*Guard breaks at Level 5]

emotion_wave.name: Emotion Wave
emotion_wave.desc:
Conjure up surging waves of lightning that travel along the ground.
[*Guard breaks on first hit]

lightning_clones.name: Lightning Clones
lightning_clones.desc: Replicated forms of yourself conjured from electricity.

lightning_strike.name: Lightning Strike
lightning_strike.desc: A strike of thunder at your desired location.

fleeting_sparks.name: Fleeting Sparks
fleeting_sparks.desc: Call forth notes of electricity that seek out your foes.

storm_blades.name: Storm Blades
storm_blades.desc: Call forth a ring of blades to strike your enemies with furious lightning.

electro_carve.name: Electro Carve
electro_carve.desc: Produce a highly potent field of electromagnetism, shocking all inside.

lightning_impact.name: Lightning Impact
lightning_impact.desc:
Slam those under you with a lightning empowered kick.
[*Guard breaks at Level 5]

spark_swap.name: Spark Swap
spark_swap.desc: Almost instantaneous swap of location with whoever your cursor is on.

beast_burrow.name: Beast Burrow
beast_burrow.desc: Burrow underneath the ground before bursting out, knocking enemies up.

dread_breath.name: Dread Breath
dread_breath.desc: Channels the song through the power of the Dread Serpent.

abyssal_ridge.name: Abyssal Ridge
abyssal_ridge.desc: Send a cascading eruption towards your foes, forcing them to react.

mecha_gatling.name: Mecha Gatling
mecha_gatling.desc: Let loose a torrent of bullets from your shoulder mounted minigun.

whirling_blade.name: Whirling Blade
whirling_blade.desc: A chitinous scythe to cut through your foes in a whirl.

pumpkin_pitch.name: Pumpkin Pitch
pumpkin_pitch.desc: Lob explosive pumpkins at your foes. Note: Requires Hallowtide '23 Seasonal Medal.

onslaught.name: Onslaught
onslaught.desc:
Reel back and swing your weapon, unleashing an onslaught of blows if it hits.
[*Guard breaks]

punishment.name: Punishment
punishment.desc: Absorb damage then return fury upon your foes.

pressure_blast.name: Pressure Blast
pressure_blast.desc: Unleash a powerful pressure blast from the weight of your weapon.

shoulder_bash.name: Shoulder Bash
shoulder_bash.desc: Rush at your enemies with full physical force.

rally.name: Rally
rally.desc: Strike your shield a few times to absorb some of the posture received by your allies.

reinforce.name: Reinforce
reinforce.desc: Buff those around you with extra defense and damage.

brace.name: Brace
brace.desc: Brace yourself against attacks and gain hyperarmour.

strong_leap.name: Strong Leap
strong_leap.desc: Kick off of the ground with your strength, sending you into the air.

throw.name: Throw
throw.desc:
Grab and throw your enemies.
[*You must defeat Titus.]

table_flip.name: Table Flip
table_flip.desc: Toss the ground infront of you.

rapid_punches.name: Rapid Punches
rapid_punches.desc: Unleash a barrage of blows against your foes.

skyshatter_kick.name: Skyshatter Kick
skyshatter_kick.desc:
Unleash two devasting kicks with your brute strength.
[*Guard breaks at Level 5]

strong_left.name: Strong Left
strong_left.desc: A powerful, flinging punch that shatters the air.

tacet_drop_kick.name: Tacet Drop Kick
tacet_drop_kick.desc: [Jus Karita] Disguise yourself in tacet and drop kick your enemies.

glare.name: Glare
glare.desc: Opponents facing you are briefly rendered immobile.

dread_whisper.name: Dread Whisper
dread_whisper.desc: Grab your opponent and whisper a terrible truth in their ear. Further truths are unbearable. Deals increased damage to the insane.

sing.name: Sing
sing.desc: Charm those around you with your powerful voice.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.desc: Taunt those around you, causing them to be unable to jump and to take 20% more damage. However, they deal 10% more damage.

prominence_draw.name: Prominence Draw
prominence_draw.desc: Close the distance and deliver a fast slash.

flashdraw_strike.name: Flashdraw Strike
flashdraw_strike.desc: Swiftly unsheathe your blade and deliver an upwards strike.

twincleave.name: Twincleave
twincleave.desc: Dart around the battlefield with devastating cleaves delivered in quick succesion.

masters_flourish.name: Master's Flourish
masters_flourish.desc: A powerful slash that chips through block and slashes through armor.

slice_n_dice.name: Slice 'n' Dice
slice_n_dice.desc: Step forward and slice through your enemies. Ability can be activated again on successful hit.

karita_leap.name: Karita Leap
karita_leap.desc: Launch yourself into a flying kick, backflipping you into the air if you hit a wall.

karita_divebomb.name: Karita Divebomb
karita_divebomb.desc: Launch into the air and deliver a devastating divebomb kick. Chains from Karita Leap.

ceaseless_slashes.name: Ceaseless Slashes
ceaseless_slashes.desc: Click to reveal yourself and deliver a rapid flurry of slashes that can chain together.

rapid_slashes.name: Rapid Slashes
rapid_slashes.desc: Rush down your opponent cutting them apart.

neural_pathway.name: Neural Pathway
neural_pathway.desc:
Using your mind's eye, you force your imagined position into reality, appearing to teleport a short distance. You alone know that the world moved, not you.
[Does not go through walls.]

prediction.name: Prediction
prediction.desc: Predict an opponent's attack and reflect it.

summon_cauldron.name: Summon Cauldron
summon_cauldron.desc: Make a cauldron appear from your memories.

exhaustion_strike.name: Exhaustion Strike
exhaustion_strike.desc: Execute a quick strike, emptying your posture when landed.

grand_wardens_axe.name: Grand Warden's Axe
grand_wardens_axe.desc:
Create a lightning axe!
[*Note: Requires Authority Ensign Origin's Shock Corps Division.]
[*Note: You can M1 during this Mantra's windup to change the attack, dealing more damage and posture damage with a vertical swing, rather than the normal horizontal attack.]

hidden_blade.name: Hidden Blade
hidden_blade.desc:
Pull out a hidden blade and quickly stab your opponent, dealing a percentage of your opponents health while also applying a bonus poison.
[*Note: Requires Authority Ensign Origin's Inquisition Division]

glorious_charge.name: Glorious Charge
glorious_charge.desc:
Yell with valor and courage, increasing the speed of those who are in your party by 20 seconds and making them unknockable for 10 seconds.
[*Note: Requires Authority Ensign Origin's Command Division.]

rupture.name: Rupture
rupture.desc: Detonate your chained target, unleashing a powerful blast that shatters their restraints and inflicts significant damage.

impel.name: Impel
impel.desc: Blast through your opponent's guard and pull them towards you.

restrain.name: Restrain
restrain.desc: Deliver a powerful kick that binds your opponent's soul to yours.

close_shave.name: Close Shave
close_shave.desc: Close the distance and deliver a fast slash.

celestial_assault.name: Celestial Assault
celestial_assault.desc: Use your wings and deliver two critical blows.

sinister_halo.name: Sinister Halo
sinister_halo.desc: Emit a spinning halo of celestial energy, trapping and shredding all caught within its wake.

ascension.name: Ascension
ascension.desc: Take to the skies for a devastating strike.

illusory_servants.name: Illusory Servants
illusory_servants.desc: Spawns an illusion of yourself that targets the closest player.

illusory_counter.name: Illusory Counter
illusory_counter.desc: If hit during the pose, negate the attacks and teleport the user behind the attacker.

mirror_illusion.name: Mirror Illusion
mirror_illusion.desc: Mirror your opponents and use their arsenal to your advantage.

arc_beam.name: Arc Beam
arc_beam.desc: Shoot out a laser from your eyes that explodes after a second, dealing fire and lightning damage.

arc_wave.name: Arc Wave
arc_wave.desc: Release a wave of energy around you, dealing fire and lightning damage.

arc_suit.name: Arc Suit
arc_suit.desc: Encases the user in a durable armor.

sightless_beam.name: Sightless Beam
sightless_beam.desc: Fires a high pressure beam from your eyes.

mindsoothe.name: Mindsoothe
mindsoothe.desc: Heal nearby Players at the cost of your Sanity.

tranquil_circle.name: Tranquil Circle
tranquil_circle.desc: Disables mantras from being used, gives 10% Monster Armour and also gain total immunity to mantras whilst inside the radius.

lethal_injection.name: Lethal Injection
lethal_injection.desc: Inject all of your readied Autobrews into your target. This might sting.

lords_slice.name: Lord's Slice
lords_slice.desc: Makes the Hidden Tendril from 'Hidden Tendril' contract, pulling both the user and enemy closer.

equalizer.name: Equalizer
equalizer.desc: A counter that leaves your opponent open

judgement.name: Judgement
judgement.desc: Summons a black casting circle before enveloping your target in black tendrils and tearing them apart.

blinding_dawn.name: Blinding Dawn
blinding_dawn.desc: Dance uncontrollably. No one can withstand the sheer groove of your spin routine.

radiant_kick.name: Radiant Kick
radiant_kick.desc: Kick your foes at the speed of light.

radiant_dawn.name: Radiant Dawn
radiant_dawn.desc:
Strike down your foes with your blinding light.
[*Guard breaks]

blade_of_saints.name: Blade of Saints
blade_of_saints.desc: Conjure a blade attack depending on your Saint Stance.

parasitic_leech.name: Parasitic Leech
parasitic_leech.desc: If linked to an enemy, this move will start leeching your opponent's health for a few seconds while healing you.

symbiotic_sustain.name: Symbiotic Sustain
symbiotic_sustain.desc: If linked to an ally, this move will take ~5% of your health and then heal your ally by that times an undefined amount.

jet_kick.name: Jet Kick
jet_kick.desc: Rush forward with a jet kick. Requires a target if you're in combat.

fake_strike.name: Fake Strike
fake_strike.desc: Trick your opponent and quickly go behind them.

tacet_kick.name: Tacet Kick
tacet_kick.desc: Slip out of perception and deliver a brutal kick.

ardour_slicer.name: Ardour Slicer
ardour_slicer.desc: Close the distance and deliver a fast slash using your Ardour.

sovereign_drive.name: Sovereign Drive
sovereign_drive.desc: Dash forward in a blink, knocking down enemies in your path.

warp_kick.name: Warp Kick
warp_kick.desc: Perform a kick, then warp to your enemies for a second followup kick.

skycrash.name: Skycrash
skycrash.desc: Leap towards your enemies and stomp, knocking up enemies caught.

palm_strike.name: Palm Strike
palm_strike.desc: Strike your opponent with your palm. If your true power is revealed, slice them up into the air.

decimate.name: Decimate
decimate.desc: Cut through your opponent, if True Strength is active, this attack will extend to nearby enemies. Fists cannot use this mantra. Autogrips players if low enough or knocked.
